Definition.Description: Nov 1, 2018 12:00 AM - Dec 1, 2018 9:00 AM Pump Performance Monitoring: In this analysis it is intended to compare the pump performance in operation versus actual pump curve and identify deviation from design as an indicator for pump health. Calculation Steps Step 1 : Input Signals (Refer
Definition.Document:
Time range

Nov 1, 2018 12:00 AM - Dec 1, 2018 9:00 AM

Pump Performance Monitoring:

In this analysis it is intended to compare the pump performance in operation versus actual pump curve and identify deviation from design as an indicator for pump health.

Calculation Steps

Step 1: Input Signals (Refer to Worksheet 1 to 4 for detail):

  • Recirc Flowrate
  • Flowrate
  • Discharge Pressure
  • Fluid SG

(step)

raw signal

Step 2: Calculated total flow through pump by adding Discharge flow to Recirc flow (step)

Step 3:  Calculated Discharge Head based on pump curve and convert to psi. (step)

Assumptions: Viscosity correction is not considered

$PressFT =(-0.02763928815*$f.convertUnits('gal/min')*$f.convertUnits('gal/min')).setUnits('')-(0.4742592803*$f.convertUnits('gal/min')).setUnits('')+8995.55514 $PressFT*0.433*0.9389.setUnits('psi')

Step 4: Created boundary of ±30% for pump curve DSC press (step)

Step 5: Created condition for Discharge Pressure deviation from pump curve Discharge Pressure (step)

Step 6: Calculate total running hour for pump performance deviation from design on monthly basis

  • Deviation from design Ind
  • Deviation from design runningSum
  • Deviation Magnitude (step)

final

 

 

1- % time in operating beyond 30% of design curve per day
